Error.BadValidator: The supplied validator must either be a function or an array of value names required to be non-empty.
Error.FormRequiresName: One or more of the forms provided lacks a `name` property.
Error.ReservedKeys: The contentData object must not contain any of the following reserved keys: {keys}
Error.TemplateFailure: The template filepath or literal passed to MHLDialog failed to compile properly.

Warning.FormLacksName: Form with no `name` found, falling back on numeric key.
Warning.RequiredFields: This dialog requires one or more fields to be non-empty: {fields}

Error.BannerType: Banner type must be one of "info", "warn", or "error".
Error.InvalidCamel: I don't think {camel} is a real camel.
Error.NotADocumentType: Type {type} is not a valid type of Document.
Error.RequiresSystem: This macro/helper/class is only compatible with the {system} system.

Target.NotAnyTargetted: Must have at least one token targetted.
Target.NotOneTargetted: Must have exactly one token targetted.

Token.Fallback: , or a token of your assigned character on the current scene
Token.NotAnySelected: Must have at least one token selected{fallback}.
Token.NotOneSelected: Must not have more than one token selected.

Error.TooEarlyForBanner: Banner creation aborted because game isn't Ready, attempted type "{type}", string: "{bannerstr}"

Type.DataModel: `{arg}` must be a class inheriting from DataModel.
Type.Folder: `{arg}` must be a Folder document or the ID of one.
Type.User: `{arg}` must be a User or the ID of one.

Error.UnsupportedDocument: Document type {type} not supported by this function.

Validation.IconSchemaGlyphExact: The glyph field of an icon font schema cannot define an exact `value`; use `choices` or `pattern`

Error.WrongDocumentTypeRetrieved: Document retrieved was not of type {type}.

Error.FieldsFormat: `fields` must be an array of only strings.

Error.NonEmptyListRequired: Icon font entries must provide a list key that is a non-empty array of strings.
Error.PlainObject: Icon font entries must be plain objects with name, prefix, and list keys
Error.SortInteger: The sort property, if provided in an icon font entry, must be an integer.
Error.UniqueNameRequired: Icon font entries must provide a name key that is not already in use.
Error.UniquePrefixRequired: Icon font entries must provide a prefix key, or array of keys, none of which are already in use.
Error.ValidatorFunction: Icon font entries must provide a validator function that can accept a string, or an array of strings, or a series of strings, and validate that at least one argument is a valid icon of your list, returning a string containing all the css classes required to make that icon valid, or empty string on failure.

Fallback.Sort: Sort value not supplied or already exists for font {name}, falling back to highest sort + 5.

Error.ItemPilesDependency: This macro requires the Item Piles module active in this world to function.

Error.FourTargetsOnly: You are only Expert in performance, so are limited to 4 targets.
Error.MinimumTrained: Must be at least Trained in Performance to use, or even have taken, Fascinating Performance.
Error.MustHaveFeat: Selected actor must have the Fascinating Performance feat.
Error.SingleTargetOnly: You are only Trained in performance, so are limited to a single target.
Error.TenTargetsOnly: You are only Master in performance, so are limited to 10 targets.

Warning.TargetImmune: Target "{name}" is immune to being fascinated.

Error.NoExistingFound: No old-style Lashing Currents weapon found on the actor of selected token "{name}".

UpdateInitiativeStatistics.AllSharedSkills: Skills shared by all selected actors:
UpdateInitiativeStatistics.DisabledTooltip: Being overridden by the all selector above.

Error.NoValidTokens: None of the selected tokens are PCs or NPCs that are neither minions nor eidolons.

Error.MalformedThing: Provided thing lacked valid label or value.
Error.ThingsFormat: `things` must be an array of \{name: string, value: any, img?: string, identifier?: string} objects.

PickItemFromActor.FilterUnmatched: Provided filter produced no valid items.
PickItemFromActor.NoItemsOfType: Selected actor lacks any items of type "{itemType}".
PickItemFromActor.NoMatchingHeld: Selected actor is not holding any matching items.

DebugMode.Hint: Enable debug logging. Showstopper errors will fire without this, but fallback
DebugMode.Name: Debug Mode

GlobalAccess.Hint: Makes the MHL API accessible via just `mhl` in the global scope. Available only after the Setup hook.
GlobalAccess.Name: Global API Access

AccordionSpeed.Name: Animated Collapsible Group Speed
AccordionSpeed.Hint: The time in ms that expanding/collapsing an animated settings group takes.

LegacyAccess.Hint: Populates `game.pf2emhl`, as is tradition. Available only after the Setup hook.
LegacyAccess.Name: Legacy API Access

LogLevel.Hint: The level at which calls to `log()` and its descendant functions will be made in debug mode if an explict type isn't passed.
LogLevel.Name: Debug Log Level

AccordionIndicatorIcon.Hint: The css class(es) used to get the icon displayed next to a collapseable group header. Usually just the glyph-identifying class is sufficient, defaults will be filled in automatically.
AccordionIndicatorIcon.Label: Accordion Indicator Icon

DisabledClass.Hint: The CSS class applied to reset-to-default buttons when their associated setting(s) is/are default.
DisabledClass.Label: Disabled Icon CSS Class

GroupResetIcon.Hint: Same as above, but for the Reset Group Settings button.
GroupResetIcon.Label: Group Reset Icon

ModuleResetIcon.Hint: Same as above, for the Reset Module Settings button's icon.
ModuleResetIcon.Label: Module Reset Icon

SettingResetIcon.Hint: Same as above, but for the per-setting reset buttons.
SettingResetIcon.Label: Setting Reset Icon

AccordionSpeed.Hint: The global speed at which animated collapsible groups transition
AccordionSpeed.Label: Animated Collapsible Group Speed

ManagerDefaultsMenu.Hint: Set the default values for several setting manager parameters for modules that haven't provided their own overrides.
ManagerDefaultsMenu.Label: Manager Defaults
ManagerDefaultsMenu.Name: Manager Defaults

Error.ModuleRequired: Must supply the module this settings reset app is for.
Error.ManagedModuleRequired: Could not find MHLSettingsManager instance for provided module {title}.
Error.IconNotFound: Could not acquire a type icon for the logged setting type.

Log.FormResetBanner: Resetting {count} form value(s) to their saved value(s).
Log.SettingDeleted: Saved setting data for {key} of {module} deleted.

Error.BadModuleID: First argument must be a string module ID or a Module object reference.

Button.Action: A button replacement action must be a function.
Button.BadFormat: Malformed button data for key {key} of {module}. Button data must be an object with at least an `action` property containing a function.
Button.Label: A setting's `button` data must contain a `label` property, either string or true (for localization key inference).

Error.DuplicateSettingKey: Setting key "{key}" already seen for {module}, skipping duplicate.

Hooks.BadHook: Hook data for setting {key} of {module} is malformed; Must be an object containing a string `hook` key.
Hooks.RequiresAction: Hook {hook} for setting {key} of {module} requires an `action` key containing a function.
Hooks.TestFunction: Hook data for setting {key} of {module} is malformed; `test`, if provided, must be a function.

Error.InvalidColorPicker: A setting with `colorPicker: true` in its data must have a default value that is a valid 7-character hex code (e.g. #FFFFFF).
Error.InvalidEnrichHintsOption:
Invalid enrichHints option for {module}. If provided, must be one of:
- A boolean (true meaning use only the default erichers)
- A Map or an Object with pattern keys and replacement values (for use with `String.replace()`)
- An Array of such pairs.
Defaulting to true.
Error.InvalidGroupData: Invalid group data encountered for group "{group}" in {module} and logged. Group data  Skipping.
Error.InvalidGroupName: Invalid group name encountered in {module} and logged. Skipping.
Error.InvalidGroupOverrideOptionValue: The value of group.overrides["{group}"].{key} for {module} is invalid. Ignoring, see the wiki for documentation.
Error.InvalidOptionData: Invalid "{option}" data for {module} found and logged. Falling back to default value(s), see the wiki for documentation.
Error.InvalidOptionKeys: The "{option}" option for {module} contained the keys [{keys}], which are not part of the schema. Ignoring.
Error.InvalidOptionValue: The value of "{option}.{key}" for {module} is invalid. Falling back to default value ({default}), see the wiki for documentation.
Error.InvalidSettingArrayEntry: Invalid entry in settings array for {module}, must be an object with `key` string property. Skipping.
Error.InvalidSettingData: Logged setting data with key "{key}" for {module} failed to validate and was not registered.
Error.InvalidSettingKey: {module} setting data contains key "{key}" which is not valid to register a setting with, skipping.
Error.ManagerAlreadyExists: A settings manager has already been registered for {module}.
Error.NoDefault: Setting {setting} of {module} does not have a default value recorded and cannot be reset.
Error.NoValidSettings: No valid settings could be retrieved from passed data for module {module}.
Error.SymbolType: Settings of type Symbol are useless for comparison against and should not be registered.

Visibility.BadFormat: Visibility data for setting {key} of {module} is invalid and has been logged and discarded. See the wiki for documentation.
Visibility.Recursion: Visibility for setting {key} cannot depend upon itself.
Visibility.RequireDependsOn: Visibility data for setting {key} of {module} is malformed: If provided as an object, must contain a `dependsOn` key containing a string setting ID or an array of such.
Visibility.RequireTest: Visibility data for setting {key} of {module} is malformed: If provided as an object, must contain a function under the `test` key.
Visibility.UnknownDependency: Setting {dependsOn} is not a registered or potential setting for {module}, so it cannot be predicated on for visibility for setting {key}.

Group.AllDefaultTooltip: This group's settings' saved values are all currently default.
Group.FormTooltipAppend: {count} setting input(s) currently differ from their saved values. Right click to reset them.
Group.FormTooltipSolo: {count} of this group's setting input(s) currently differ from their saved values. Left or right click to reset them.
Group.SavedTooltip: This group has {count} setting(s) that aren't default. Left click to reset them.

Module.AllDefaultTooltip: This module's settings' saved values are all currently default.
Module.FormTooltipAppend: {count} setting input(s) currently differ from their saved values. Right click to reset them.
Module.FormTooltipSolo: {count} of this module's setting input(s) currently differ from their saved values. Left or right click to reset them.
Module.SavedTooltip: This module has {count} setting(s) that aren't default. Left click to reset them.

Reset.NotConfigurableTooltip: This setting is not configurable from the settings application.

Setting.FormTooltipAppend: This setting's input currently differs from its saved value. Right click to reset it.
Setting.FormTooltipSolo: This setting's input currently differs from its saved value. Left or right click to reset it.
Setting.SavedTooltip: This setting differs from its default value. Left click to reset it.

ResetMultiple.AllDefault: All settings are currently equal to their default value
ResetMultiple.AllGroupDefault: This group's settings are all currently default
ResetMultiple.AllModuleDefault: This module's settings are all currently default
ResetMultiple.Body: This {type} has {defaultlessCount} setting(s) without defaults, and {areDefault} setting(s) that are unchanged from their default. This action will reset:
ResetMultiple.Footer: Note: This will apply immediately to the actual settings, not just the inputs in the settings window.
ResetMultiple.GroupTooltip: Reset this group's settings to default
ResetMultiple.ModuleTooltip: Reset this module's settings to default

ResetSingle.DialogBody:
Default value: {value}
Note: This will apply immediately to the actual setting, not just the input in the settings window.
ResetSingle.IsDefault: Setting is currently equal to its default value
ResetSingle.Tooltip: Reset this setting to its default value

Warning.SettingTypeNonConfigurable: Setting {key} for {module} is of a type that does not produce a valid input in the settings configuration app. Falling back to `config: false`.

Icon.Generic: Provided input(s) did not produce a valid icon string from any {registered}{allowed} icon font.{fallback}
Icon.ExistingHTML: Provided input(s) contained HTML which did not resolve to a valid icon HTML string.{fallback}
Icon.MissingRequired: Provided input(s) are missing the required part "{slug}" for font "{fontName}".{fallback}

Fallback.BannerType: Provided notification banner type "{type}" is not valid, using fallback "{fallback}".
Fallback.FirstTarget: This operation requires a single target, using first target "{name}".
Fallback.FirstToken: This operation requires a single selected token, using first token "{name}".
Fallback.LevelOutOfBounds: Provided level ({level}) out of bounds! Defaulting to level 25.
Fallback.LogType: Provided log type "{type}" is not valid, using fallback "{fallback}".
Fallback.Type: Expected parameter "{arg}" to be of type "{expected}", not "{type}". Casting.

Warning.SystemBelowVerified: Your system version ({version}) is older than what Macro & Helper Library is verified for ({verified}). This may cause things to break, or might not; No guarantees.
